title: 54kW Kohler NG Project
description: Low Hour 5.7L GM Propane/Natural Gas Project
specs: Condition: Project Generator: Requires controller installation (New controller included)

title: 105kW WinPower 8.1L 454 Turbo Natural Gas
description: Formerly a firestation backup unit, this 100kW natural gas generator is powered by a GM 454-Turbo engine. It's housed in an industrial enclosure and has approximately 340 hours. The unit cranks, runs, and generates exactly as it should, providing 3-phase 208V, 347A or single-phase power. There is a rust hole on the turbo manifold, which is visible in the pictures.
specs: Condition: Cranks, Runs, stabilizes, not load tested (insufficient fuel supply at Ecru), rust hole in exhaust.

title: 40kW 5.7L Natural Gas
description: Formerly a firehouse power backup, this Winpower 40kW generator is in an industrial enclosure and is powered by natural gas, featuring a 5.7L GM engine. The unit has approximately 315 hours and runs and generates power exactly as it should, providing single or 3-phase power.
